title: Roman and Williams, STUDIO V, Raymond / Nicolas, Subtila, and Jenkins are Archinect Jobs' latest featured employers
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and Miami. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active...
text: In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and Miami. For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools. New York City-based design firm Roman and Williams Buildings and Interiors has three exciting job opportunities: a Sr. Designer, Architecture - Residential with a minimum of five to eight years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD, an Architectural Designer - Residential with a minimum of two to five years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD and SketchUp, and a Sr. Interior Designer, Residential with a minimum of seven to ten years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office. The Standard NY Hotel by Roman and Williams Buildings and Interiors.STUDIO V Architecture is in search of a Project Manager in New York City with seven-plus years of experience and proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, Rhino, Adobe Creative Suite, Bluebeam, and Procore. The ideal applicant possesses experience with all phases of a project, from concept through construction administration, and has a strong command of NYC building codes and zoning regulations. One should also have excellent communication skills, strong leadership skills, and be able to multi-task. Empire Stores by STUDIO V Architecture.Boutique architecture and interior design studio Raymond / Nicolas is hiring for an Architectural Drafter with five-plus years of experience and an expert-level proficiency with AutoCAD in Miami. Strong candidates will have a strong understanding of architectural standards, building codes, and construction documentation. The firm is also seeking individuals with strong communication and organizational skills and the ability to independently and as part of a collaborative team. Modera Douglas Station II by Raymond / Nicolas.In Los Angeles, Subtila has an opening for a Junior Architect with two to three years of experience. Candidates should have strong communication and organizational skills. Experience with local permitting and construction administration is preferred. Residential experience is a plus, however, the role also includes working on cultural, retail, hospitality, and industrial projects. Farfax Garage (with Part Office) by Subtila.Preservation and restoration office Jenkins Architecture is seeking a Junior Preservation Architect with up to two years of experience in New York City. Applicants should have a working knowledge of AutoCAD and Microsoft Office, be comfortable with taking site measurements and translating those measurements to drawings, and possess good writing and communication skills. Fulton Street Façade Restoration by Jenkins Architecture.If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
In this week's curated employer highlight from Archinect Jobs, we are featuring five architecture and design firms with current openings in New York City, Los Angeles, and Miami.

For even more opportunities, visit the Archinect job board and explore our active community of job seekers, firms, and schools.

New York City-based design firm Roman and Williams Buildings and Interiors has three exciting job opportunities: a Sr. Designer, Architecture - Residential with a minimum of five to eight years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD, an Architectural Designer - Residential with a minimum of two to five years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD and SketchUp, and a Sr. Interior Designer, Residential with a minimum of seven to ten years of experience and is fluent in AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office.

STUDIO V Architecture is in search of a Project Manager in New York City with seven-plus years of experience and proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, Rhino, Adobe Creative Suite, Bluebeam, and Procore. The ideal applicant possesses experience with all phases of a project, from concept through construction administration, and has a strong command of NYC building codes and zoning regulations. One should also have excellent communication skills, strong leadership skills, and be able to multi-task.

Boutique architecture and interior design studio Raymond / Nicolas is hiring for an Architectural Drafter with five-plus years of experience and an expert-level proficiency with AutoCAD in Miami. Strong candidates will have a strong understanding of architectural standards, building codes, and construction documentation. The firm is also seeking individuals with strong communication and organizational skills and the ability to independently and as part of a collaborative team.

In Los Angeles, Subtila has an opening for a Junior Architect with two to three years of experience. Candidates should have strong communication and organizational skills. Experience with local permitting and construction administration is preferred. Residential experience is a plus, however, the role also includes working on cultural, retail, hospitality, and industrial projects.

Preservation and restoration office Jenkins Architecture is seeking a Junior Preservation Architect with up to two years of experience in New York City. Applicants should have a working knowledge of AutoCAD and Microsoft Office, be comfortable with taking site measurements and translating those measurements to drawings, and possess good writing and communication skills.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
